privacy.accountables.heading: 1. Name and contact details of the responsible controller
privacy.accountables.copy: The responsible controller as defined in the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other national data protection laws of the EU member states as well as other data protection-related provisions is:
privacy.accountables.company-data.name: Savedate
privacy.data-usage.heading: 2. Provision of the website and creation of log files
privacy.data-usage.scope.heading: Scope of data processing
privacy.data-usage.scope.copy-1: For every access query to our website, our server automatically collects data and information from the querying computer system.
privacy.data-usage.scope.data-list-headi: The following data is collected in this process:
privacy.data-usage.scope.data-list-2: The date and time of the query
privacy.data-usage.scope.copy-2: This data is compiled in log files and saved on our server. No further personal data is stored together with the log file data.
privacy.data-usage.legal.heading: Legal basis for processing
privacy.data-usage.legal.copy: The legal basis for temporarily processing data and log files is provided in Art. 6 (1 f) GDPR.
privacy.data-usage.purpose.heading: Purpose of processing
privacy.data-usage.purpose.copies-1: Data storage in log files is required to ensure the functionality of the website. Furthermore, the data enables us to optimise the website and guarantee the security of our IT systems. Data analysis for marketing-related purposes is not performed in this context.
privacy.data-usage.purpose.copies-2: These purposes correspond to the legitimate interests of data processing as indicated in Art. 6 (1 f) GDPR.
privacy.data-usage.duration.heading: Duration of storage of personal data
privacy.data-usage.duration.copy: All data stored in log files is erased within seven days. A longer period of data storage is possible. In such cases, the users IP address is erased or anonymised in such a way that renders it impossible to identify the querying client.
privacy.cookies.heading: 3. Use of cookies
privacy.cookies.copy: This website does not use cookies.
privacy.invites.heading: 4. Invitations and participations
privacy.invites.scope.heading: Scope of data processing
privacy.invites.scope.copies-1: On our website, users can create invitations and send them to other people. The data entered, such as the name of the invitation, description, date, time and timezone, is saved for this purpose. Users who accept an invitation have the option of entering their name. This is also saved for processing.
privacy.invites.scope.copies-2: No data will be passed on to third parties in this context. The data will be used exclusively for processing the request.
privacy.invites.legal.heading: Legal basis for processing
privacy.invites.legal.copy: The legal basis for the processing of the data transmitted in the course of creating an invitation or participation is Art. 6 (1 f) GDPR.
privacy.invites.purpose.heading: Purpose of processing
privacy.invites.purpose.copy: The processing of personal data serves us solely to process the creation of the invitation and the presentation of participations. This also constitutes the necessary legitimate interest in the processing of the data.
privacy.invites.duration.heading: Duration of storage of personal data
privacy.invites.duration.copy: The data you send to us will remain with us until you ask us to delete it, revoke your consent to storage or the purpose for data storage no longer applies (e.g. when deleting an invitation). Mandatory legal provisions - in particular legal retention periods - remain unaffected.
